name: Corvus Corax (and other fun games I regret making)
name_original: Corvus Corax (and other fun games I regret making)
description:
A collection of games I made while pretending to be someone else...

Games Included -

1.Corvus Corax : It just wants to be understood

2.Mind the gap : Will it spoil

3.Mask : You are special

4.Talk : I just can't connect

6.Dogs Duty : Woof

7.The Artist's Day Off : This game could change your life

Donations are much appreciated :)
